divs: Sighting DetailsWhilst sat in the garden I was looking up at the sky.��� I then noticed a bright white light moving in the sky.��� At first I thought it was a plane but there were no green and red lights flashing as you would expect. All there was was a bright white light moving from west to east towards Bedford area. Its speed was at a regular speed. I look for any aother activity in the sky and noticed planes in the sky with there green and red lights flashing which made myself more suspicious.��� Then the white light just seemed to turn off???��� Told my family about it and was then told that there had been several sightings with the same discription.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Bedford
There were no other sightings in Bedford on or around July 29th 2008
Summary: Bright white light with no other lights flashing. moving west to east at a regular speed
